results.title: 'Where dead men lie': spotlight the director
results.creator_credit: Chris McGill, Graham Chase, Richard Mason and Film Australia
results.brief_description: Based on the production of “Where dead men lie”, highlighting the role of the director, Keith Gow. This film shows his involvement in screen testing, location shooting, editing and mixing. Suitable for Years 7-12.
results.title_for_label: ‘Where dead men lie’: spotlight the director
results.creator_credit_for_label: Chris McGill, Graham Chase, Richard Mason and Film Australia
results.description: Based on the production of “Where dead men lie”, highlighting the role of the director, Keith Gow. This film shows his involvement in screen testing, location shooting, editing and mixing. Suitable for Years 7-12.
description_for_label: Based on the production of “Where dead men lie”, highlighting the role of the director, Keith Gow. This film shows his involvement in screen testing, location shooting, editing and mixing. Suitable for Years 7-12.

results.title: Ned Kelly: paintings by Sidney Nolan
results.creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Alan Harkness, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
results.brief_description: The story of Australia’s best known bushranger is told through the paintings of Sidney Nolan, accompanied by a ballad played on the guitar. Made with the co-operation of the Museum of Modern Art of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Burstall, Alan Harkness, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
results.description: The story of Australia’s best known bushranger is told through the paintings of Sidney Nolan, accompanied by a ballad played on the guitar. Made with the co-operation of the Museum of Modern Art of Australia.
